Books.desc: Pick a book (can be any book) and read.

Dual N Back Training.desc: Use a Dual-N-Back app (like brain workshop) and use Dual-N-Back or Quad-N-Back to increase your IQ.

Water.desc: Just drink the average glass size at your house. (A liter is the perfect amount to drink each hour.)

Meditate.desc: Try to figure out something by yourself, without google, the internet, or any exterior source of information...
